verification_mode: Verify on the DB that the opportunity exists
typical_user_phrasing: "Create a new opportunity," "Show me open deals," "Edit this opportunity"
example_sub_actions: CREATE NEW OPPORTUNITY, MODIFY OPPORTUNITY, DELETE OPPORTUNITY, OPPORTUNITY SEARCH, CLONE OPPORTUNITY, VIEW OPPORTUNITY DETAILS, SUMMARIZE OPPORTUNITIES

verification_mode: Verify on the DB that the opportunity has been modified with the correct parameter
typical_user_phrasing: "Add a new client," "Find this customer," "Update client info"
example_sub_actions: CREATE NEW CLIENT, CLIENT SEARCH, MODIFY CLIENT

verification_mode: Verify on the DB that the correct opportunity records are retrieved according to the search criteria
example_sub_actions: CREATE NEW CONTACT, CONTACT SEARCH, MODIFY CONTACT

verification_mode: Not to be verified, there is a mechanism in which the user can upload the doc to perform RAG on it. Common use case, with the usual ground truth- runtime evaluation obtained response response comparison
typical_user_phrasing: "Create a quote for this opportunity," "Show quote details," "Compare quotes"
example_sub_actions: CREATE QUOTE, MODIFY QUOTE, DELETE QUOTE, CANCEL QUOTE, QUOTE DETAILS, COMPARE QUOTES, COMPARE QUOTE DETAILS, QUOTE SEARCH, QUOTE PREFIXES

verification_mode: Verify on the DB that the quote has been created with the correct details and linked to the related opportunity
